html:
2025-0825
2025-11-27FINBank of Canada ActAppointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of CanadaApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of Marjolaine Giasson of Québec, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2026, in the place of Robert Malcolm Campbell, whose term has expired.N/A
subject: Appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of Marjolaine Giasson of Québec, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2026, in the place of Robert Malcolm Campbell, whose term has expired.
